verbs.description: " [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: has] [ARG1: a policy] and it 's very clear : We will protect those who protect us , " the president said

" The Trump administration has a policy and it 's very clear : We [V: will] protect those who protect us , " the president said

" [ARG1: The Trump administration has a policy and it 's very clear : We will protect those who protect us] , " [ARG0: the president] [V: said]
